column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////came here because that's what people do when they're in Chicago. I should start out by saying I don't love deep dish pizza. But I love pizza in general so I figured it be fun. Our waiter wasn't very friendly and she messed up our orders twice
column2: but when we finally got our pizzas they were fine (I didn't like the sauce flavor)8. If you love the dish you'll probably love this
column3: I'm just glad I went so now I can say I did.
